attributes.additional_details:
We the public do not want these benefit changes going ahead.  I feel within myself that this is an appalling thing to do and it's basically attacking people who are vulnerable and cannot really defend themselves.   I am a bit against Scottish independence but the way the conservatives have been treating us is horrible (Absolutely horrible)

There is going to be more suicides

A lot of people are scared of these back to work assessments
(It's probably a company that does not understand mental health problems)

STOP THESE CHANGES GOING AHEAD
